response.overview: When office worker Daniel Rubenstein discovers a mysterious USB stick placed beside his car, he unwittingly sets off a chain of terrifying events. Inside the device: a list of names—each marked ELIMINATED, except his, which ominously reads PENDING. As paranoia takes hold, Daniel is haunted by the feeling that something is watching him. No matter how many times he tries to destroy or discard the USB he cant escape it. As the presence draws nearer and the line between reality and delusion fades, Daniel must confront the horror stalking him before his name is crossed off for good. PARANOIA is a chilling psychological thriller that explores fear, surveillance, and the descent into madness.
response.title: Paranoia
